text: @kelly_jasper_88 @Butterfly6875 @kelly_rdc YES!  It is airborne and much of the spreading is due to that. We're told to stay a MINIMUM of 3 feet (~1 meter) from other people, and 6 feet is strongly recommended.  When you cough it easily travels 3 feet, 6 feet for a deep cough.  NEVER touch your face.
